homePage.description: 請輸入一個軸承型號以計算額定壽命、摩擦力損失、潤滑參數、過滾頻率和二氧化碳排放當量

sustainabilityCard.title: 想要瞭解有關 Schaeffler 永續發展的更多資訊嗎？

operationConditions.title: 軸承的運作條件
operationConditions.prototypeWarning: 在此開發原型中顯示的值皆為假設，不得用於生產

co2Downstream.subTitle: 在操作中因摩擦而產生的 CO₂e
co2Downstream.text: 全面資訊，立即計算我們旋轉產品在各種應用場景下的 CO2e 排放。
co2Downstream.textAvailable: Schaeffler 現在提供全面資訊，立即計算我們旋轉產品在各種應用場景下的 CO2e 排放。
co2Downstream.title: 新

operationConditions.loadCaseTimePortionDescription: 用於摩擦 / CO₂e 計算：
operationConditions.loadCaseTimePortion: {{ loadcasePercentage }}% 的 {{ totalTime }}小時 等於 {{ loadcaseTime }}小時
operationConditions.generalInputsTitleTooltip: 這適用於所有載荷狀況
operationConditions.emptyState: 請從可用計算清單中選擇您要執行的計算

confirmationDialog.title: 確認刪除
confirmationDialog.description: 您確定要刪除載荷狀況嗎？

tooltip.radialLoad: 徑向方向的載荷（指定為絕對值）
tooltip.axialLoad: 軸向方向的載荷（指定為絕對值）

errors.minMaxInconsistent: 最小值必須小於最大值
errors.operatingTimeValueTotal: 載荷狀況總數不可超過 100%
errors.tmpBoundViolation: 運作溫度必須高於周圍溫度

tooltip.rotationSpeed: 內環與外環之間的相對旋轉速度（指定為絕對值）
tooltip.shiftFrequency: 每分鐘擺動次數（完整循環，來回擺動）
tooltip.shiftAngle: 擺動轉折點之間的角度

lubrication.title: 潤滑條件
lubrication.notAvailable: 此類型的潤滑不適用於您所選的軸承。
lubrication.oilBathNote: 油浴潤滑表示最底部的滾動元件有一半在油中

typeOfGrease.label: 潤滑油類型
typeOfGrease.description: 選擇用於計算軸承的潤滑油類型。
typeOfGrease.tooltip: 潤滑油影響顯著，因為其會影響摩擦、熱能產生、磨損和整體軸承性能等因素

isoVgClass.label: ISO VG（國際標準組織潤滑油黏度級數）等級
isoVgClass.description: 請選擇您潤滑油的 ISO VG 等級。
isoVgClass.tooltip: ISO VG 等級是對潤滑油黏度的分類

viscosity.label: 輸入黏度
viscosity.description: 請輸入您在 40°C（ny 40）的黏度和 100°C（ny 100）的黏度。

operatingTemperature.label: 運作溫度
operatingTemperature.tooltip: 軸承的運作溫度（如有必要，請估計）

operatingTime.label: 總運行時間
operatingTime.description: 8766 小時相當於一年內全天候使用

fossilOriginOptions.cngBiomethane: 含生物甲烷的CNG（壓縮天然氣）

calculation.calculationImpossible: 您指定的參數無法執行計算。

co2Emissions.upstreamHint: 基於生產中假設的估計值
co2Emissions.downstreamHint: 基於產品使用中的假設的估計值

calculationResult.guideIntervalServiceLife: 潤滑油使用壽命的引導值（tfG）
calculationResult.emissionsTooltip: 二氧化碳當量（CO₂e）是將各種溫室氣體的氣候效應標準化的單位。因此，不同的溫室氣體排放混合物可進行比較。
calculationResult.frictionalPowerlossUnavailable: 針對所選軸承，此計算無法使用。
calculationResult.productionTooltip: 這是生產滾動軸承時所排放的二氧化碳當量總和，包括必要的資源和能源。
calculationResult.usageTooltip: 由於功率損失導致的總體CO2排放量。

downstreamErrors.modelNotExisting: The calculation of frictional power losses and CO2e emissions is not provided for this bearing.
downstreamErrors.modelLubricationNotSupported: The calculation of frictional power losses and CO2e emissions is not provided for this bearing and the selected lubrication.
downstreamErrors.churningLossCalculationNotSupported: For this bearing is no churning loss calculation provided.
downstreamErrors.invalidRotationType: The condition of rotation 'Rotating innerring' must be selected for the calculation of frictional power losses and CO2e emissions.
downstreamErrors.timePortionBelowMinimum: The sum of the time portions must be more than zero.
downstreamErrors.timePortionExceeds100Percent: The sum of the time portions must be 100% or less.
downstreamErrors.sumOfTimePortionsExceeds100Percent: The sum of the time portions must be 100% or less.
downstreamErrors.invalidMovementType: The motion influence 'rotating' must be selected for the calculation of frictional power losses and CO2e emissions.
downstreamErrors.operatingTemperatureBelowLimit: The operating temperature is too low for the calculation of frictional power losses and CO2e emissions.
downstreamErrors.operatingTemperatureExceedsLimit: The operating temperature is too high for the calculation of frictional power losses and CO2e emissions.
downstreamErrors.invalidViscosityDefinition: The selected viscosity definition of the lubricant is not admissible for the friction calculation.
downstreamErrors.invalidLubricationMethod: The selected lubrication is not admissible for the calculation of frictional power losses and CO2e emissions.
downstreamErrors.invalidGreaseSelection: The selected grease is not admissible for the calculation of frictional power losses and CO2e emissions.
downstreamErrors.invalidViscosityClass: The selected ISO VG class of the lubricant is not admissible for the calculation of frictional power losses and CO2e emissions.
downstreamErrors.ny100ExceedsNy40: The viscosity of the lubricant at 100°C must be smaller than the viscosity at 40°C.
downstreamErrors.ny40BelowLimit: The viscosity of the lubricant at 40°C is too low for the calculation of frictional power losses and CO2e emissions.
downstreamErrors.ny40ExceedsLimit: The viscosity of the lubricant at 40°C is too high for the calculation of frictional power losses and CO2e emissions.
downstreamErrors.ny100BelowLimit: The viscosity of the lubricant at 100°C is too low for the calculation of frictional power losses and CO2e emissions.
downstreamErrors.ny100ExceedsLimit: The viscosity of the lubricant at 100°C is too high for the calculation of frictional power losses and CO2e emissions.
downstreamErrors.speedBelowThreshold: The speed is too low for the calculation of frictional power losses and CO2e emissions.
downstreamErrors.speedExceedsLimitingSpeed: The speed exceeds the limiting speed.
downstreamErrors.p0BelowC0Min: The equivalent static bearing load P0 is lower than the minimum load.
downstreamErrors.p0ExceedsStaticLoad: The equivalent static bearing load P0 exceeds the static load rating C0.
downstreamErrors.loadAngleBelowNominalContactAngle: The load angle is smaller than the nominal contact angle. Thus, resulting internal axial forces are not sufficiently supported.
downstreamErrors.operatingViscosityBelowLimit: The operating viscosity based on the lubrication and operating temperature is too low for the calculation of frictional power losses and CO2e emissions.
downstreamErrors.operatingViscosityExceedsLimit: The operating viscosity based on the lubrication and operating temperature is too high for the calculation of frictional power losses and CO2e emissions.
downstreamErrors.viscosityRatioBelowLimit: The viscosity ratio kappa is too low for the calculation of frictional power losses and CO2e emissions.
downstreamErrors.viscosityRatioExceedsLimit: The viscosity ratio kappa is too high for the calculation of frictional power losses and CO2e emissions.
downstreamErrors.radialLoadBelowLimit: The radial load must be a positive value.
downstreamErrors.radialLoadNotSupported: This bearing only supports axial loads.
downstreamErrors.axialLoadBelowLimit: The axial load must be a positive value.
downstreamErrors.axialLoadBelowMinimum: The axial load is smaller than the minimum axial load.
downstreamErrors.axialLoadExceedsLimit: The axial load exceeds the permissible axial load.
downstreamErrors.axialLoadNotSupported: This bearing only supports radial loads.
downstreamErrors.loadRatioTooSmall: The ratio between axial load and radial load is too small for this bearing type.
downstreamErrors.loadRatioTooLarge: The ratio between axial and radial load is too large for this bearing type.
downstreamErrors.operatingTemperatureTooLow: The operating temperature must be higher than the ambient temperature.
downstreamErrors.oilTemperatureRiseTooLow: The increase in oil temperature must be zero or more.
downstreamErrors.oilVolumeFlowTooLow: The oil flow must be zero or more.
downstreamErrors.externalHeatFluxTooHigh: The external heat flow must be less than the dissipating heat flow.
downstreamErrors.referenceViscosityIsZero: The reference viscosity is equal to 0.
downstreamErrors.meanDiameterIsZero: The mean diameter is equal to 0.
downstreamErrors.unsupportedEnergySource: The energy source is not supported.
downstreamErrors.genericError: An error has occurred. The calculation has failed.

lubrication.guideIntervalRelubrication: 重新潤滑間隔的引導值
lubrication.guideIntervalServiceLife: 潤滑油使用壽命的引導值

ratingLife.title: 額定壽命
ratingLife.lh10: 以小時為單位的總額定壽命（公稱）
ratingLife.lh_nm_unavailable: 請在您的計算中新增「潤滑參數」以顯示此值
ratingLife.lh_nm: 經修改的額定壽命（以小時為單位）
ratingLife.p0: 每載荷狀況的等效靜載荷
ratingLife.p_i: 每載荷狀況的等效動載荷

pdfReport.disclaimer: 保留與本文件相關的所有權利，即使在應授予專利或註冊新型專利的情況下亦然。本文件必須視為機密文件。未經我方書面同意，本文件之正副本或任何其他完整內容或其中摘錄內容之轉譯，皆不得提供予第三方或由接收者以任何其他方式不當使用。本文件係根據您如上所述之要求與我方自行假設所編製。我方的詳細資料會依據您所提供之要求考量顯而易見的風險。本文件之編製僅與購買我方之產品相關。本文件中顯示的結果業經審慎編製且符合技術發展現狀，但並不構成法律意義上對於品質或耐用性的明示或默示保證。您無法因此而免於檢查產品的適用性。僅在蓄意或疏忽的情況下，我方才會對本文件中提供的詳細資料負責。若本文件是供應協議的一部分，則應適用該協議中的責任條款。
